page.title: 06CITY SUBURB_CHESTER
page.content: { UPTON}IS A POPULAR PLACE TO LIVE. PEOPLE ARE FRIENDLY AND THERE IS NO RACIAL PREJUDICE.MOST INHABITANTS WORK LOCALLY AND UNEMPLOYMENT IS LOW.BUSES ARE FREQUENT BUT EXPENSIVE.BRITISH RAIL HAVE MOVED THE STATION NEARER THE CENTRE OF POPULATION. SOME CRITICS SAY THERE IS LITTLE SOCIAL LIFE FOR THE YOUNG AND A COMMUNITY CENTRE IS NEEDED.OTHER COMPLAINTS ARE THAT DOGS FOUL THE PAVEMENTS,THE COUNCIL IS SLOW TO REPAIR PROPERTY,NOISY YOUTHS ANNOY OLDER CITIZENS AND THE TRAFFIC NOISE, ESPECIALLY FROM THE NEW M53 MOTORWAY IS TOO GREAT. OLDER PEOPLE LOOK FORWARD TO THE OPENING OF THE NEW SAFEWAYS SUPERMARKET IN THE AUTUMN AS IT WILL BE CONVENIENT AND CHEAP FOR THEM.OTHERS COMPLAIN THAT IT IS AN UGLY NEW BUILDING,THAT IT WILL TAKE CUSTOM FROM A ROW OF SMALL SHOPS AND CREATE TRAFFIC CONGESTION.
